review: I wanted this for my bedroom TV.  I have a wi-ifi Blu Ray player in my living room, but I wanted to be able to watch Netflix in my bedroom.  This was on sale and I decided to try it.  You do not need a Cablebox to use it.  It works well and the customer service is excellent.  I do have a flat screen TV in my bedroom.  Well worth the price.  Streams from my iPad.  My niece has three of these in her three homes.
